channel.title: Immport Data on ImmPort Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Immport Data on ImmPort Blog

item.title: Get funded to use ImmPort Data
item.description: Did you know NIAID funds researchers to develop new or improved ways to use ImmPort shared data? The Cooperative Agreement PAR-16-253, posted in May 2016, does just that. For those of you pondering the possibilities, a brief summary of the first and second round awardees follows. 2017 Dr. Steve Kleinsteinâ€™s team at Yale University is developing LinkedImm, a system designed to integrate ImmPort vaccine studies, linking those studies to other public resources such as pathway databases, gene ontology and publications, to support hypothesis-driven queries.
